episodes.title: The Problem with Tony Robbins (Deep-Dive - Pt.1)
episodes.description:
TRIGGER WARNING: If you don't want to hear about emotional abuse I'd check out at the #metoo part, everything before that is fine. You can check back in for part 2, it won't be about this stuff at all.

Thank you to all my Patrons!!
Top 2 tiers - You'll get your names rapped/sung at the end of part 2!
Join any tier to get access to all extra content - I'll be uploading a new video on there soon!
https://www.patreon.com/munecat

Merch store: https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/munecat-store
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/munecatmusic
Twitter https://www.twitter.com/munecatmusic

Today we're looking at Tony Robbins' background, his study of NLP, his "interventions", and his disturbing attitude towards women, including the #metoo comments and the Buzzfeed News allegations.
In part 2 we'll be looking at his dodgy business advice, his dodgy health advice and more...

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1G6ClmWzNByqP8PWXPPPbmSexB1StJ18tYMeOYhpXxwI/edit?usp=sharing

00:00 Intro
03:05 The Self-Help Industry
08:05 How Tony Became the God of Self-Help
12:35 The Seedy Origins of NLP
20:28 "I Am Not Your Guru"
24:13 The Stutter "Cure"
31:51 How Tony Creates a Criticism-Free Bubble
33:09 The #metoo Incident
35:37 The Buzzfeed Allegations
43:37 Tony's Disturbing Attitude Towards Women
01:16:27 More Buzzfeed Allegations (They Get Worse)
01:22:36 Tony's Hypocritical Teachings around "Masculine" and "Feminine" Energy

episodes.title: The Problem with Tony Robbins (Deep-Dive - Pt. 2)
episodes.description:
Part 2 is here! Today we're looking at Tony's ties to dodgy doctors and scientists, and his mass manipulation to get vulnerable people addicted to his products and seminars.
